ai-atk-s0403a18:2_1: In the fourth hymns he doesn’t know satisfaction that is Vedas.
ai-atk-s0403a18:2_2: But when he has his own mind thus, he is a piercing in the Buddha’s presence.
ai-atk-s0403a18:2_4: while staying in the wilderness, he is seeking the forest extra mind, but having come to the series of mind, then the mind is called “purification of mind”.
ai-atk-s0403a18:2_5: For the praised by the Buddha, and this is how they praised by the disciples of Buddha.
ai-atk-s0403a18:2_6: There is this. The meaning is that.
ai-atk-s0403a18:2_7: That there is no other thing that there is something else, and that is the meaning.
ai-atk-s0403a18:3_0: The fourth sub-chapter on forest is finished.
